price: 19. Kuwase ku gaalooba Aayadahayaga waa kuwaas qolada Bidixda (ehlu Naarka).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
